detail_desc: Jumper in a soft rib knit with crossover lacing down the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Top in an airy cotton weave with short sleeves and a small opening with a heart-shaped button at the back of the neck. Broderie anglaise and a scalloped trim around the sleeves and hem.
Blouse in a viscose and linen weave with a small stand-up collar. V-neck opening at the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist.
Suede slides with covered block heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Sandals in suede and sturdy woven fabric with straps that tie around the ankles and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Sandals in suede and sturdy woven fabric with straps that tie around the ankles and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Platform sandals in suede with a braided jute trim, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, and wedge heels. Rubber soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 9.5 cm.
Platform sandals in suede with a braided jute trim, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, and wedge heels. Rubber soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 9.5 cm.
Platform sandals in suede with a braided jute trim, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, and wedge heels. Rubber soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 9.5 cm.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with a reversible sequin motif.
Cotton chambray trainers with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Padded tongue and heels. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cotton chambray trainers with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Padded tongue and heels. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Imitation leather biker jacket with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, a chest pocket and side pockets. Lined.
Jacket in patterned denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, fake flap pockets with a press-stud at the top, and press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details. Low waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details. Low waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details. Low waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in patterned cotton jersey.

Set with a pair of dungaree shorts in woven fabric and a T-shirt in slub cotton jersey. Dungaree shorts with patch front pockets, straps with adjustable buttoning, and embroidery and appliqués on the front. Buttons at the sides and concealed press-studs at the crotch. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with a bodice covered in shimmering sequins. Narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps, a zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a skirt in several tiers of pleated flounces to create width. Lined.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants. Length 6.5 cm.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants. Length 6.5 cm.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a button fly and raw-edge hem.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a button fly and raw-edge hem.

Dress in tulle with sequined embroidery. Concealed press-studs at the back, butterfly sleeves in a double layer of tulle, and a gathered seam with a scalloped trim at the waist that creates width in the skirt. Sewn-in satin underdress.
Hairband in cotton chambray with a decorative knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Maxi dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck front and back and a concealed zip at the back. Short sleeves, a seam at the waist and a slit at the front. Unlined.
Flared skirt in sequined tulle with a glittery elastic waistband and double flounces at the hem. Satin lining.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a flap back pocket with a button, and legs with creases. Regular Fit.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a flap back pocket with a button, and legs with creases. Regular Fit.
Playsuit in soft, patterned jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a gentle V-neck, elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Lace trims around the top and hems.
Calf-length lace skirt with a high, elasticated waist, concealed zip at the back and scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt that can be wound around several times. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt that can be wound around several times. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt that can be wound around several times. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in sequined mesh with a draped bodice, narrow satin shoulder straps with decorative bows at the front and elastication at the back, and a small frill trim at the top. Satin panel at the front, a zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and tiered flounces to add width to the skirt. Lined.
Pleated top in patterned jersey with a round neck and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide tie belt. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with draping. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide tie belt. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with draping. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide tie belt. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with draping. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a yoke with decorative gathers at the shoulders and back. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a yoke with decorative gathers at the shoulders and back. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a yoke with decorative gathers at the shoulders and back. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and roomy legs. Button fly and raw-edge hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and roomy legs. Button fly and raw-edge hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and roomy legs. Button fly and raw-edge hems.

Shirt in premium cotton poplin with a cutaway collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in premium cotton poplin with a cutaway collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in cotton twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Joggers in cotton twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Calf-length skirt in a soft weave with a faux wrapover at the front, smocking at the back, a wide tie belt and rounded slits at the front. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a soft weave with a faux wrapover at the front, smocking at the back, a wide tie belt and rounded slits at the front. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length, pleated skirt in an airy, patterned weave with a high waist with covered elastication and a wrapover front. Short jersey inner skirt.
Ankle-length, pleated skirt in an airy, patterned weave with a high waist with covered elastication and a wrapover front. Short jersey inner skirt.
Shorts in sturdy jersey with a zip fly and buttons and high waist with pleats at the front. Side pockets and fake flap back pockets with a button.
Short shorts woven in a stretch viscose blend with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the top to create volume. Zip fly and buttons, side pockets and wide legs.
Short shorts in cotton denim with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and zip fly. Side pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Puff pants in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the waist and hems.
Boots in imitation leather with an imitation suede shaft and a tab with a decorative metal buckle at the top and over the foot. Fleece linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Warm-lined boots in glossy imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Warm-lined boots in glossy imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Warm-lined boots in glossy imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Sandals in imitation patent leather with chiffon appliqués at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with low heels and fluted soles. The boots are made partly from recycled polyester.
